/-- A σ-compact Hausdorff topological manifold over a finite dimensional real vector space is
metrizable. -/
theorem manifold_with_corners.metrizable_space {E : Type _} [normed_add_comm_group E] [normed_space (exprℝ) E]
    [finite_dimensional (exprℝ) E] {H : Type _} [topological_space H] (I : model_with_corners (exprℝ) E H) (M : Type _)
    [topological_space M] [charted_space H M] [sigma_compact_space M] [t2_space M] : metrizable_space M :=
  by
  haveI := I.locally_compact; haveI := charted_space.locally_compact H M
  haveI : normal_space M := normal_of_paracompact_t2
  haveI := I.second_countable_topology
  haveI := charted_space.second_countable_of_sigma_compact H M
  exact metrizable_space_of_t3_second_countable M
#align manifold_with_corners.metrizable_space manifold_with_corners.metrizable_space
